package.name: asr_flock_of_birds_tracking
package.description: This package controls a motorized robot head (a sensor setup equipped with a PTU) in order to ensure that the hand of a human user remains inside its field of view. The human hand is tracked with the help of an Ascension - Flock of Birds system. The purpose of this package is to enable continuous localization of objects during their manipulation through the tracked hand.
package.author: Engelmann Stephan, Heller Florian, Meißner Pascal, Stöckle Patrick, Wittenbeck Valerij
